Room.Name: Hanabal and Gustave's Light Swords
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a quaint, old-fashoned steel foundry where fine swords are forged.
Room.LongDescription: These swords are renouned around Oceancrest as being very strong and long lasting. Hanabal and Gustave's swords are made by hand and slowly polished and sharpened. They take great pride in their handywork and guarantee that you'll like any weapon you buy from them.
